review_title: Little bit small but otherwise great!
reviews: The top part of the shirt is a bit too snug.For reference im 5.5 and 155 lbs, ordered a medium. Some people said it was really big so that's why I got medium instead of large (sometimes im M, sometimes im L). My arms arent particularily big but my shoulders are broad. The underarm/top across the chest and sleeves were tight. I love the way it hangs and looks though so I'm going to return & repurchase in a large when it comes back in stock
product_name: Urban CoCo Women's Half Sleeve High Low Loose Casual T-Shirt Top Tee Dress

review_title: Really like it....want more in other colors now.
reviews: Glad I listened and ordered a size up.....the arms are a tighter fit so you may want to consider that. Everywhere else seems generous. I've already washed it and it did not shrink but I dried on gentle as it is 100% cotton. I ordered the blue color and online it appears more washed out than in person. It is more vibrant and actually I prefer it. It is of a heather appearance. I kind of want to order more colors now that I have one.
product_name: Urban CoCo Women's Half Sleeve High Low Loose Casual T-Shirt Top Tee Dress

reviews:
Too small and too large - product not as described...

This item arrived in very poor condition; seams had seperated, the fabric was thin, the sleeves were tiny and short like a child's garment and would not fit an adult however thin they were, while the body was cut like an enormous tent!

I will NEVER order from this company again and will be returning the item once I receive my return label from amazon.ca.
product_name: Urban CoCo Women's Half Sleeve High Low Loose Casual T-Shirt Top Tee Dress

reviews: Love this shirt! I bought the Khaki and light blue and they are awesome over Jeggings! Flows very nicely and hangs just right. Some people did not like the sleeves but they sit on my arms exactly as shown on the model. (I find it's hit and miss with most items made in China. What works for some, doesn't for others. Trying to guess the size is always a mystery!) Anyway, I really like them and would definitely recommend. Comfy, soft, and chic.
product_name: Urban CoCo Women's Half Sleeve High Low Loose Casual T-Shirt Top Tee Dress

review_title: I still liked it and will probably buy two more colours
reviews:
Just picked up my order and tried it on when I got it. I found it was a bit snug in the shoulders, and I bought an X-Large.
My shouders are 18 inches wide and it was snug. I still liked it and will probably buy two more colours.
Because...you ladies know what it's like when you find a shirt you like - you buy 3 more in different colours.

review_title: Hard to tell without trying it on
reviews: Liked the look of it, so decided to try it. I usually take an XL in tops, but I have a large bust, so I ordered this in 2XL, in the dark grey. The colour and style looked exactly like the picture. The front hit me at upper thigh - longer than a t-shirt, but definitely too short for me to wear as a dress. But the overall fit was...odd. On the pro side, it was very billowy without making me feel like I was wearing a shapeless potato sack. Was fitted at the top and then flowed out. The seams, buttons, etc were all good quality. On the con side, I found the area around the seam where the arm is attached to the body of the top (so the shoulder/armpit area) weirdly tight compared to the rest of the top. The neck was a little wide, so my bra straps were visible. And although the back was very drapey and billowy, I found the front clung a bit to my belly. I waffled back and forth on whether to keep it, but in the end, I decided to return it. I think it would have looked better if I had a smaller chest. But one of those things where I think it's hard to tell until you actually have it on.
product_name: Urban CoCo Women's Half Sleeve High Low Loose Casual T-Shirt Top Tee Dress

review_title: ... for someone of my height (5'8) but an absolutely great high low top
reviews: Definitely not a dress for someone of my height (5'8) but an absolutely great high low top. Incredibly soft and lightweight fabric for those hot summer nights but gives great coverage. I love how this item hangs on my frame and flows when I move. Great for hiding my not so great mid section . Looks great with leggings or capris.

review_title: and the shirt looks more like a mat leave top
reviews: The item is definitely intended for someone shorter. I'm 5'10, and the shirt looks more like a mat leave top. I think if I was shorter it would hang longer and look better. If you're short, it will likely look like it does on the model.

review_title: Love them - bought two and back for more.
reviews: I ordered large to be on the safe side because I have large upper arms and don't like tops being too snug in the arm/armpit area. The large is perfect so long as it doesn't shrink. Item is made out of 100% cotton so I will be sure to wash in cold water and hang dry as recommended. I love the two tops I bought so much, I am checking to see if they have the other colours I wanted in Extra Large. Some colours weren't available in large but might be in extra large.
